text: Kadayanallur taluk is a taluk in Tenkasi district in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It was created with Kadayanallur town as the headquarters due to the population increase and developmental issues.http://tamil.oneindia.com/news/2012/12/21/tamilnadu-new-taluk-ll-be- formed-with-kadayanallur-as-hq-166668.html There are 30 villages in the Kadayanallur taluk excluding Kadayanallur town itself. ==Reference== Category:Tirunelveli district
title: Kadayanallur taluk
